segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this mess too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, isn’t he?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how bold they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so clueless, it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and they don’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is like something out of a cartoon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and no one is noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is the most entertaining thing I’ve seen all day.
segments.speaker: PAR
